fields.name: CpuLimitMHz
fields.description:
Gets or sets CPULimitMHz which specifies a CPU usage limit in MHz.
Utilization will not exceed this limit even if there are available resources.

fields.name: CpuReservationMHz
fields.description:
Gets or sets CPUReservationMHz which specifies the CPU size in MHz that is guaranteed
to be available.

fields.name: CpuSharesLevel
fields.description:
Gets or sets CPUSharesLevel which specifies the CPU allocation level for this pool.
This property is used in relative allocation between resource consumers.

fields.name: CustomResourceName
fields.description: Gets the name of the corresponding resource in Kubernetes.

fields.name: InventoryItemId
fields.description: Gets or sets the inventory Item ID for the resource pool.

fields.name: MemLimitMB
fields.description:
Gets or sets MemLimitMB specifies a memory usage limit in megabytes.
Utilization will not exceed the specified limit even if there are available resources.

fields.name: MemReservationMB
fields.description:
Gets or sets MemReservationMB which specifies the guaranteed available memory in
megabytes.

fields.name: MemSharesLevel
fields.description:
Gets or sets CPUSharesLevel which specifies the memory allocation level for this pool.
This property is used in relative allocation between resource consumers.

fields.name: MoName
fields.description: Gets or sets the vCenter Managed Object name for the resource pool.

fields.name: MoRefId
fields.description: Gets or sets the vCenter MoRef (Managed Object Reference) ID for the resource pool.

fields.name: ProvisioningState
fields.description: Gets or sets the provisioning state.

fields.name: Uuid
fields.description: Gets or sets a unique identifier for this resource.

fields.name: VCenterId
fields.description: Gets or sets the ARM Id of the vCenter resource in which this resource pool resides.
